title: aniviva legacy skins
body: hey im a anivia main and i want to know when the 2 legacy anivia skins are coming back plz tell me {{champion:34}}

replies.body:
Legacy skins only come out of the vault during special events. Since these are generally announced ahead of time, I recommend keeping your eyes on the [News & Announcements page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).

Let me know if you have any questions!
do they come out every year if so did it came already this year, and if the legacy vault come back this year will they release all legacy skins. {{champion:34}}

I'm not aware of legacy skins having been available this year so far, but that info will be announced on the page I linked. Additionally, you can potentially get some legacy skins through Hextech crafting, but only a small chance to do so. 

Our complete guide for Legacy Skins can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).
